cells.data:
-- foldr :: (a -> b -> b) -> b -> [a] -> b
on foldr(f, startValue, xs)
    tell mReturn(f)
        set v to startValue
        set lng to length of xs
        repeat with i from lng to 1 by -1
            set v to |Î»|(item i of xs, v, i, xs)
        end repeat
        return v
    end tell
end foldr
